DocLocalization.Name: Ensemble de couches de matériau homogène

DocAttribute.Name: MaterialLayers
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identification of the _IfcMaterialLayer_’s from which the _IfcMaterialLayerSet_ is composed.

DocAttribute.Name: LayerSetName
DocAttribute.Documentation: The name by which the _IfcMaterialLayerSet_ is known.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
TotalThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Total thickness of the material layer set is derived from the function _IfcMlsTotalThickness._
